Space is boring. The farther you go, the more alone you find yourself. 
And just why would you want to be away from any kinds of civilization, 
alone in the void.

The predacon shapeshifter had her answer.

Sanguine was out for revenge.

She had decided to rejoin Megatron on Earth because she had lost a 
friend there. Tarantula had died at the hands of the Vok, and 
primitive Earth was the most probable place where she could find them.

She had just come out of the wormhole and she spotted a small maximal 
ship, clearly built for military purposes. If they were here, a ship 
was a ressource that was worth destroying...
